ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Basic parameters obtained by the 32m ESR
ResourceHeader.Description: Basic parameters obtained by the 32m EISCAT Svalbard Radar (ESR). Data files are distributed in the CDF format by NIPR. The integration time is normally 60 sec or antenna scan time. If you want to use data with the other integration time, you can search them at the website: http://polaris.nipr.ac.jp/~eiscat/eiscatdata/.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The EISCAT data are the intellectual property of the EISCAT Scientific Association. They may be freely used for the purpose of illustration for teaching and for non-commercial scientific research, provided that the source is acknowledged and to the extent justified by the non-commercial purpose to be achieved. Substantial use of these data should be discussed at an early stage with knowledgeable scientists within the EISCAT Scientific Association (e.g., Y. Ogawa (the data representative of Japan; yogawa [at] nipr.ac.jp)). An example of the acknowledgement statement is as follows: "EISCAT is an international association supported by research organisations in China (CRIRP), Finland (SA), France (CNRS, till end 2006), Germany (DFG), Japan (NIPR and STEL), Norway (NFR), Sweden (VR), and the United Kingdom (STFC)."

NumericalData.Keyword: EARTH SCIENCE Sun-earch Interaction Ionosphere/Magnetosphere Dynamics Aurorae

Parameter.Name: Range gate number
Parameter.Description: Range gate number

Parameter.Name: Universal time
Parameter.Description: Time label in CDF_EPOCH (the number of milliseconds since 01-Jan-0000)

Parameter.Name: Integration time
Parameter.Description: Integration time in sec

Parameter.Name: Azimuth
Parameter.Description: Azimuth angle of a beam in deg

Parameter.Name: Elevation
Parameter.Description: Elevation angle of a beam in deg

Parameter.Name: Latitude
Parameter.Description: Geographical latitude of a gate in deg

Parameter.Name: Longitude
Parameter.Description: Geographical longitude of a gate in deg

Parameter.Name: Altitude
Parameter.Description: Altitude of a gate in km

Parameter.Name: Ne
Parameter.Description: Electron number density in m^-3

Parameter.Name: Neerr
Parameter.Description: Error of electron number density in m^-3

Parameter.Name: Te
Parameter.Description: Electron temperature in K

Parameter.Name: Teerr
Parameter.Description: Error of electron temperature in K

Parameter.Name: Ti
Parameter.Description: Ion temperature in K

Parameter.Name: Tierr
Parameter.Description: Error of ion temperature in K

Parameter.Name: Vi
Parameter.Description: Ion velocity in m/s

Parameter.Name: Vierr
Parameter.Description: Error of ion velocity in m/s

Parameter.Name: Collision frequency
Parameter.Description: Collision frequency in log10(1e-3)

Parameter.Name: O+/Ne
Parameter.Description: Ratio of O+ number density to Ne number density in 1e-3

Parameter.Name: q
Parameter.Description: Quality of the fitting (0 means OK.)

Parameter.Name: q flag
Parameter.Description: Data quality flag

Parameter.Name: nrange max
Parameter.Description: Max number of range gate

Parameter.Name: Tx power
Parameter.Description: Radar transmitter power

Parameter.Name: mconst
Parameter.Description: Magic constant number for electron density calibration

Parameter.Name: Heating
Parameter.Description: Flag of heating measurement (0: heating OFF, 1: heating ON)
